participant_1.background: i hate school. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i am a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox.

participant_2.background: i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town. my family has raised horses for a generations. i want to be a lawyer. i dream of moving to the city.
